text: ninnalute bharyamar ninnalute krsiyitamakunnu. atinal ninnal icchikkum vidham ninnalkk ninnalute krsiyitattil cellavunnatan‌. ninnalute nanmaykk ventat ninnal munkutti ceytu vekkentatuman‌. ninnal allahuve suksikkukayum avanumayi ninnal kantumuttentatuntenn arinnirikkukayum ceyyuka. satyavisvasikalkk ni santeasavartta ariyikkuka
